me.NightBits.HttpClient

Class NightBitsHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.NightBits.HttpClient.NightBitsHttpClient
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NightBitsSyncHttpClient

    public class NightBitsHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for creating an HttpClient This class is used to create a httpClient so Http requests could be made
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    NightBits (Jeroen Saey)

                             java.lang.String responseBody)

                          java.lang.String password,
                          AuthScope scope)
        Set the basic authentication for a Http request defined by a scope
        Parameters:
        user - The username for the basic authentication
        password - The password for the basic authentication
        scope - The authorization scope where the basic authentication is required

        Cancel all the requests that are current queued by the HttpClient

        context - The context for the Http requests
        cancelIfRunning - Determines whether an active request can be cancelled

      • getUrlWithQueryString

        public static java.lang.String getUrlWithQueryString(java.lang.String url,
                                     NightBitsRequestParameters parameters)
        Returns the url with the queryString for the given url and parameters
        Parameters:
        url - The url that needs to contains the queryString
        parameters - The parameters that contain the elements that need to be converted to a queryString
        Returns:
        The given url combined with the parameters as a queryString
